issue.title: Need to document ARROW_LIBHDFS_DIR
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-359](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-359). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In light of ARROW-358, we need to add a note to the HDFS docs about `$ARROW_LIBHDFS_DIR`. This is the path to where `libhdfs.so` can be found in a non-standard installation.
